name: Dracula's Lost Tribute
description:
Play as Dracula as you go to the Nearby Village to redeem the Tribute you have been Denied! Just Beware not to get too sloppy, The Red Waning moon Causes Blood to burn upon contact, But not just against you...

Controls

Cutscene:

Advance Text -> E

Skip -> F

Go back one line -> Up Arrow

Gameplay:

E => Attack (Up to 4 times)

Space => Jump

Left shift => Dash

F=> At 25% Blood (Blue bar) or higher, Consume to restore health.
